concept.title: Kerberos Authentication
concept.shortdesc: You can use Kerberos authentication to connect to HBase. When you use Kerberos authentication, the uses the Kerberos principal and keytab to connect to HBase.

conbody.p: HBase destinationKerberos authenticationKerberos authenticationusing for HBaseThe Kerberos principal and keytab are defined in the configuration file. To use Kerberos authentication, configure all Kerberos properties in the configuration file.
